description: The Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, today chaired a high level meeting on the drought and water scarcity situation in parts of Gujarat. The Chief Minister of Gujarat, Smt. Anandiben Patel, was pres
caption: www.narendramodi.in
message:
CM Anandiben Patel & officials met me to discuss drought mitigation & water scarcity situation in parts of Gujarat. 

Was briefed about the extensive efforts towards water conservation in Gujarat. Glad to see progress being made in micro-irrigation. Emphasised on value addition in agriculture, cash crops & discussed measures to boost fishery, bee-keeping, pearl culture & seaweed farming. http://www.narendramodi.in/instantarticle/pm-reviews-drought-and-water-scarcity-situation-at-high-level-meeting-with-gujarat-cm
